name: DOWN'S DARK
description:
What is that

i cant see anything , it's too dark

oh there's a torch , that's good

welcome at Omar's submit for gamemaker toolkit game jam 2018 - 2019

this game is a game without any mechanics but some tips to open the gate

so get a copy of that ( exe, nsis, zip ) game and enjoy then tell us your feedback

( problem has detected, the download of fixed game is below );

exe : https://www.4shared.com/file/chLQ2fPkgm/DOWNS_DARK.html

zip : https://www.4shared.com/zip/vnyF5rwlee/DOWNS_DARK.html
